```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(tsibble)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
gdp_clean <- read_csv("clean_data/gdp_clean.csv")
```

```{r}
gdp_clean <- gdp_clean %>% 
  mutate(date = make_date(date))
```
#create tibble object
```{r}
gdp_clean_ts <- gdp_clean %>% 
  select(-country_code) %>% 
  as_tsibble(index = date,
             key = c(country_name))
```

#summarise for UK vs other developed countries
```{r}
gdp_clean_ts <- gdp_clean_ts %>% 
  group_by(development_flag) %>% 
  summarise(across(gdp_growth_per_capita:log_gdp_per_capita, ~mean(.x, na.rm = TRUE)))
```
###GDP/capita vs RoW
```{r}
gdp_clean_ts %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = gdp_per_capita, colour = development_flag))+
  geom_line()
```

###GDP annual growth/capita vs RoW
```{r}
gdp_clean_ts %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = gdp_growth_per_capita, colour = development_flag))+
  geom_line(position = "dodge")
```
